text:
Him BSAOQ uarters
14 Qregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
TO: Dick Hull
Henry C hadeayne
Harold BUI
Jim Mile*
Burton Paulu
Frank Scfcooley 1/
FROM: H. J. Skoraia
DATE:
15, 1558
Under various preseine* which 1 wont bore you with. Mat thing* bare gone
to you In some haste, without adequate explanatory notes, or checking the
last two days.
The meeting, as discussed with you all, is at the Del Prado Hotel, Tuesday,
January 21 at 8:38 AM. A meeting room has been reserved, we hope to be
finished by about 4:88 PM*
Yesterday two “Documents" were sent you. These are in essence appendices,
the item number referring to the item number* listed fit the Draft Request sent
you earlier. These “Documents” were received after the Request draft was
sent: otherwise they would have been Included.
1 am attaching herewith erne more such document ~~ from Motorola.
See you Tuesday,
HJS:Jg
Enclosure
